subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text: According to one theory, derived from {{m|ja|手貫|tr=tanuki||[[arm]] [[glove]], [[gauntlet]]}}, where raccoon dog [[hide#Noun|hide]] was sometimes used for.
